page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Within this area a large percentage of the population are employed in {Northampton},but some commute to and from {London}.The few who do work in this area are probably employed in one of these companies:{ {Collins & Co. }who handmake fireplaces to order. {John Innes Gilks }who produce road signs,which they distribute all over the country. {Heelers Engineering }Mr Heeler asks skilled workers to come into the factory and make seat components for him to sell to the companies who have ordered them in advance. {Heygates }is a flour mill who employ most of the people in this area.It attracts youngsters who are finding it hard to get jobs elsewhere.
